channel.title: Someone Help PI!
channel.description: Okay so im trying to make Duel Weild D Scim's Seems Simple But for PI I got it so it kinda works? But they both go to one hand... Want it so the older model D scim goes to other hand... Change Itemassistant so when wielded it goes to shield. Changed Itemdef_2 so it works and shows up.. But when i weild both.. it goes in right hand.. how do i fix to make duel.. Heres a picture of it.. [img]http://www.tinyuploads.com/images/7Jpcpd.png[/img]

item.title: Someone Help PI!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The model itself isn’t made to show up in the other hand.
